Question
========
  
Which of the two assumptions below belongs/belongs to the t-test for repeated measures?

I. The observations at time 1 are independent of the observations at time 2. II. The difference scores are normally distributed. 
Answerlist
----------
* Assumption I yes, assumption II no.
* Assumption I does not, assumption II does.
* Both assumptions belong.
* Neither assumption belongs.
